name: In-app Guided Tours
description: Contextual walkthroughs and discoverability overlays to improve new user activation.

name: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
description: Add optional 2FA for improved account security and compliance.

name: SmartWorkspace Recommendations
description: AI-driven suggestions for project templates, automations, and content to boost team productivity.

name: BulkEdit Pro
description: Powerful bulk edit tools for tasks, contacts, and properties with undo support.

name: Advanced Reporting Dashboards
description: Self-serve dashboards with cross-data visualizations and scheduled exports.

name: Public API v2
description: Expanded public API with webhooks, batching, and improved auth for third-party integrations.

name: Single Sign-On (SSO) with SAML/OIDC
description: Enterprise SSO support to streamline onboarding and meet security requirements.

name: Recurring Tasks Scheduler
description: Flexible recurring rules for tasks and automation with timezone-aware scheduling.

name: Rate Limiting & Throttling Controls
description: Introduce rate limits and per-tenant throttling to protect platform stability.

name: Auto-Sync with Salesforce
description: One-way and two-way sync options with Salesforce for accounts, contacts, and deals.

name: Notification Engine Refactor
description: Refactor and consolidate notification pipelines to reduce latency and failures.

name: SLA Uptime Monitoring & Alerts
description: Enterprise-facing uptime SLAs with monitoring dashboards and incident alerts.

name: Offline Mode
description: Enable viewing and editing key items while offline with background sync.

name: Custom Themes & Branding
description: Allow account-wide custom themes, brand colors, and custom domain support for enterprise customers.
